Chris Morris wrote:

>>We have a hanging unit test suite -- is there a TextRunner that will
>>output the name of each test class (and possibly test method) as it's
>>being run so we can find where in the suite it's hanging?
>>
>>

I hacked out my own textui.TestRunner descendant class to use in a
verbose mode. Piece of cake, really.
